item.title: About me
item.description: My name is Jonathan COURBON. I am assistant professor in the Université Clermont Auvergne (France) in the Campus of Le Puy-en-Velay. I give lessons in the Departement Métiers du Multimédia et de l’Internet in web technologies (HTML, PHP, databases) and interactive system developement (Arduino, Processing). I am the director of the «Licence Professionnelle Métiers du Numérique: conception, rédaction et réalisation web» since 2017. I am sensitive regarding environmentally-related questions for website creation.
